data.name: Panic Floor!!
data.detailed_description:
********************************** ABOUT **********************************
Panic Floor!! is an extremely unforgiving and constrained precision platformer with fast paced flow and carefully crafted levels!!
The game also features an intense hard mode that will test how well you can handle under time pressure.

******************************** SAVESYSTEM ********************************
How it works:
» Easy mode has an auto-save that will automatically save your current room.
» To continue your progress enter the elevator door that will be opened the next time you boot up the game.
» Hard mode does NOT provide an auto save feature so closing the game will NOT save your current room.
» Entering/Re-entering both Easy or Hard mode doors while you have progress will reset and overwrite your progress.
» Completing the game in any difficulty will award you with 3 *NEW* different costumes!!

***************************CONTROLS***************************
----------------------------------Key Board -----------------------------------
[A]---------------------------Left
[D]---------------------------Right
[W]---------------------------Enter next room/Pose
[S]---------------------------Duck
[J]---------------------------Jump
[S]+[J]-----------------------Power Jump
=OR=
[🡠]---------------------------Left
[🡢]---------------------------Right
[🡡]---------------------------Enter next room/Pose
[🡣]---------------------------Duck
[Z]----------------------------Jump
[🡣]+[Z]-----------------------Power Jump

------------------------------(xBox) Controller-------------------------------
[🡠]---------------------------Left
[🡢]---------------------------Right
[🡡]---------------------------Enter next room/Pose
[🡣]---------------------------Duck
[A]----------------------------Jump
[🡣]+[A]-----------------------Power Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 32-bit
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Graphics: A graphics card is not required to run this game
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
